name: AccPKPD
summary: Accelerated analysis of routinely generated PKPD data
short_description:
Routine PKPD work in preclinical drug discovery typically includes collecting and merging data from several experiments, potentially with different dose administrations and dosing schedules, choosing a mathematical model, applying numerical methods for simulation and parameter estimation, and finally preparing a report for project review. In practice, data often comes as Excel documents and results are reported as Power-point presentations.

AccPKPDaccelerates PKPD analysis by providing fundamental software modules that significantly facilitate implementation of tailored solutions. It contains modules for representing an experiment, defining a model, simulating a model, and for parameter estimation. Furthermore, AccPKPDcompletes the full PKPD analysis work stream by supporting reading and writing data from/to Excel (Matlab built-in) and writing presentations to Power-Point.
